description.oldValue:
The new Outlook for Mac will automatically shorten links and assign the file name for OneDrive and SharePoint files using the document’s name as URL. With this update you can also see and manage the files' permissions. Note: Legacy Outlook for Mac won't receive this update.
GA date: November CY2022
description.newValue: The new Outlook for Mac will automatically shorten links and assign the file name for OneDrive and SharePoint files using the document’s name as URL. With this update you can also see and manage the files' permissions. Note: Legacy Outlook for Mac won't receive this update.
